issue.title: [CI] Notify in Slack about broken builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2682](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2682). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
As we want to start using nightlies, we need a better way to notify us of failures. First iteration that at least will notify me is to push failure messages into Slack from Travis.
